[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1601388604795{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/M-EDR.jpg?id=11622) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column width=”1/2″ responsive_css=”padding_right_large:0px|padding_right_medium:40px|padding_right_small:40px”]

Managed Endpoint
Detection & Response (M-EDR)

Protect user devices against multiple threat vectors including viruses, malware and file-less attacks.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”right top” css=”.vc_custom_1597850702615{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 270px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/M-EDR-1.jpg?id=11623) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1601027053005{padding-right: 80px !important;}”]

Managed Endpoint Detection & Response (M-EDR)

Protect user devices against multiple threat vectors including viruses, malware and file-less attacks.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”0″ bg_position=”right top” css=”.vc_custom_1601386458396{background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/hone-bg-n-1-e1601386432579.jpg?id=12964) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Left” css=”.vc_custom_1588847349437{margin-top: -230px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}” ca_delay=”260″ ca_duration=”3000″]

Why choose a Managed EDR Service?

[vc_row_inner gap=”25″ el_class=”square-icons”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-xs-12″]

Combining market-leading EDR technology with Falanx Cyber analysts to hunt and remediate threats.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-xs-12″]

Significantly faster investigation and response.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-xs-12″]

Protect user devices against multiple threat vectors.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1601386330410{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Background-Slashesv6-e1597159764970-1-e1601386282442.jpg?id=12962) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/6″][vc_video link=”https://vimeo.com/462953702″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1600442159968{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/EMDR-2.jpg?id=11125) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″ el_id=”detect-information-section”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-xs” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″][/vc_column][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-md-offset-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ responsive_css=”margin_left_large:15%25|padding_left_large:7%25|margin_left_medium:15%25|padding_right_medium:7%25|padding_left_medium:7%25″ ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”30″ css=”.vc_custom_1600433156945{padding-top: 3% !important;padding-right: 3% !important;padding-bottom: 3% !important;padding-left: 3% !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.82) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}”]

Protecting your endpoints

[vc_column_text]Protect your endpoints against a variety of attacks through enhanced monitoring at the device level to spot intrusion earlier and, if appropriate, isolate the device whilst further investigation reveals next steps remedial action.

Our M-EDR security monitoring service combines market-leading EDR technology with teams of highly trained Falanx Cyber analysts who actively hunt, investigate, and remediate threats from our UK security operations centre (SOC).[/vc_column_text]

Did you know EDR is also available as part of our Managed Detection and Response service?

Find out more
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_position=”left bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1597850052041{border-bottom-width: 60px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/mdr-grey-bg-yellow.jpg?id=11570) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner gap=”20″][vc_column_inner enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”600″ ca_init_translate_y=”30″]

Rapid investigation and immediate intervention

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner gap=”20″ css=”.vc_custom_1597850072942{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”600″ ca_init_translate_y=”30″ offset=”vc_col-xs-12″ el_class=”ipad-full-width”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1597661844068{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”]

Our endpoint protection platform includes trade craft protection techniques that cover the MITRE ATT&CK™ Matrix, enabling us to stop targeted attacks at any stage before damage and loss occur.

These points combined drive the Mean Time to Detect (MTTD) and Mean Time to Respond (MTTR) down to a couple of seconds. That, in turn, significantly reduces the cost, time, and effort in dealing with any cyber-attack.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”900″ ca_init_translate_y=”30″ offset=”vc_col-xs-12″ el_class=”ipad-full-width”][vc_column_text]

With average dwell times in excess of 90 days, long-term data retention is key. All data is streamed to Falanx Cyber’s backend SOC infrastructure, where it is retained for up to 1 year for future analysis.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1597842701836{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;padding-left: 10% !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/blurred-background.jpg?id=8878) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ offset=”vc_col-xs-12″ el_class=”cta-banner”][vc_column_text]

Looking for a managed detection and response service to hunt for and proactively respond to cyber-threats in real-time?

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ align=”text-right” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”] Request a quote [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm” css=”.vc_custom_1601635024777{margin-top: 30px !important;}”] Request a quote [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” bg_position=”center bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1591199773555{padding-top: 75px !important;padding-bottom: 75px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/slash-background-for-box-buttons-2.jpg?id=9304) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″ enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-sm-offset-2″ ca_init_translate_y=”50″][vc_empty_space height=”40px”]

Standard features included in our
M-EDR service

[vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text el_class=”mobile-left”]

Endpoint protection, security operations, and threat hunting programmes powered by the speed, scalability, and power of Falanx Cyber, Endgame and Elastic.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_row_inner enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”35″ ca_init_rotate_x=”0″ ca_init_rotate_y=”0″ ca_init_translate_z=”0″ ca_init_rotate_z=”0″ ca_duration=”1200″ ca_delay=”150″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0″ el_class=”ipad-full-width”]

Instant action

Enjoy the comfort of knowing that your infrastructure is being constantly monitored and, in the event of suspicious activity, action will be taken to isolate the offending item before it can do harm.

Online & offline

Whether staff are on or offline, in the office or working remotely, their endpoints are constantly protected.

Simple, lightweight, yet powerful

Our lightweight agent consumes minimal system resources, typically less than 1%, whilst offering next-generation cyber protection.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0″ css=”.vc_custom_1600937336068{margin-top: -10px !important;}” responsive_css=”margin_top_large:50px” el_class=”ipad-full-width”]

24x7x365 Service

Protection any time, day or night, including weekends and bank holidays. Clients can rest easy when away from work, safe in the knowledge that if anything happens, we are watching from our UK SOC.

Prevent to protect

We look for signs of intrusion and prevent malicious code from being executed, protecting you from zero-day attacks.

Defence against APT attackers

Our M-EDR solution has been independently evaluated against the tactics, techniques, and procedures of two major Advanced Persistent Threat (APT) campaigns.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1596629965192{padding-top: 60px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;}” el_class=”o2c-white-text”][vc_column]

Full feature list

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1596629972211{padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;}” el_class=”o2c-white-text”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Our service

24x7x365 service

[vc_column_text]Alerting any time, day or night, including weekends and bank holidays.[/vc_column_text]

Real-time alerting

[vc_column_text]React immediately to mitigate and minimise the risk and costs associated with a potential breach.[/vc_column_text]

Regular reporting

[vc_column_text]Summary reporting of the incidents raised and dealt with over the prior period at both a business and technical level.[/vc_column_text]

Enterprise-class security solutions for all

[vc_column_text]Whatever your budget and needs, Falanx Cyber has a solution for you that you can afford.[/vc_column_text]

Instant response

[vc_column_text]Reduce mean time to respond and, consequently, reduce risk of a breach through immediate intervention.[/vc_column_text]

Validated by the best

[vc_column_text]Our service is built upon components that are validated by Gartner, Forrester and MITRE.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Our toolset

Malware and ransomware prevention

[vc_column_text]Protect your devices against all kinds of attack from traditional sources and threat actors.[/vc_column_text]

Phishing prevention

[vc_column_text]Prevention is the best solution – leverage Machine Learning to identify rogue attachments earlier and avoid opening the file.[/vc_column_text]

Exploit prevention

[vc_column_text]Block attempts to exploit vulnerabilities — even zero-day vulnerabilities and kernel exploits designed to elevate privileges — before any malicious code can execute.[/vc_column_text]

File-less attack prevention

[vc_column_text]As threat actors use more sophisticated, file-less attacks it is important to spot them before they execute.[/vc_column_text]

Machine learning / artificial Intelligence

[vc_column_text]Complements rule-based alerts in SIEM to provide speedy, enriched alerting from multiple sources.[/vc_column_text]

Milliseconds matter

[vc_column_text]Hunt for threats with a rapid succession of ad-hoc queries. Drill into and pivot through underlying data at will. And do it all with the technology fast enough for the sharpest analysts.[/vc_column_text]

Secure. By design

[vc_column_text]Implement authentication and network traffic encryption. Create user roles and implement index- and cluster-level permissions. Manage access to Kibana saved objects like dashboards.[/vc_column_text]

Retain the data you need

[vc_column_text]With average dwell times in excess of 90 days, long-term data retention is key. Elastic scales as big as you need, stores data for as long as you want, and makes searching through it simple and fast.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax=”enable_parallax” enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Right” enable_overlay=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1601386499858{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 140px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Testimonials-V2.jpg?id=12953) !important;background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ el_id=”testimonials-about” row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-4″]

Testimonials

[/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-9″]

“I have been very impressed by the high standard of Falanx’s communication, testing procedures and reporting. From the initial engagement with Adam through to test reports and follow up advice they have provided exceptional service and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them; we will certainly be using them again for future testing.”

Claudia Zimmer
Operations Manager, Ensign Pensions

“The team at Falanx have been great, from an initial enquiry to completing the test has been seamless. Our account manager Adam and the rest of the team have been incredibly reactive in responding to our queries and the work performed has been great. I would not hesitate to recommend Falanx for your IT Security needs.”

Mitchell Smith
Product Manager, One Site Global Ltd

“We have worked with Falanx Cyber for several years and have always been impressed with the professional service they provide. This begins with the early stages of planning, providing useful advice on which areas to focus testing on, including any specific details around emerging threats. This continues with the execution of the agreed pen tests and vulnerability assessments where we are kept informed throughout the whole process, and finally with the informative reports produced and any assistance required following any remediation efforts.”

James Myhill
Head of IT, Canal and River Trust

“Falanx provided us with a phishing campaign that delivered a invaluable insight into how our staff reacted to potentially dangerous phishing attempts. The Phishing results were very  enlightening and will help shape our internal cyber security awareness program. We were very pleased with the design and execution of the campaign and we will continue to use Falanx for further phishing campaigns to prove the effectiveness of our cyber security training”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“Falanx conducted in-person training session that made employees engage, participate, and ask questions. Rob the trainer showed us that human recognition is one of the most important lines of defence against phishing and cyber security attacks. We especially enjoyed Rob’s stories of social engineering and made all employees sit up and think how important all aspects of cyber security not just attacks via conventional means.”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“We see great value in investing in positive reinforcement of staff, especially in delivering awareness training. Due to COVID-19 on site training was not possible but Falanx were able to step in and provide their usual high quality cyber security training over web.”

Cyber Security Manager
Leading Specialist Bank
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
